body:
Hey guys back again with another spotlight. If you want one of your own, fill out the application format here: https://goo.gl/forms/f9XjcBVJ5vMl72bZ2. Today's spotlightee is Myv!

What is your username in Minecraft and what is your favourite game on Avicus?
My username is Myv and my favourite gamemode was CTH but is now Frenzy or TDM.

Introduce yourself in 3-4 sentences.
My name is Rhys and I am 14 years old. I live in England and enjoy gaming, scootering and watching Youtube. I also like fashion.

What are you the most excited/obsessed over at the moment?
The new Call of Duty (sad, I know) and also the fact that Christmas is rather near. Other than that, just happy as I am.

What interests you the most in life?
Scootering as I said above is a big hobby of mine but I also take online gaming seriously. On the other hand, I am currently doing Design Technology for GCSE and this actually really fascinates me, to my surprise.

​What music/art/media do you like?
John Newman, Rudimental, Bastille and Passenger are my favourite music artists. I am not that interested in art, and I enjoy Youtube, but I dislike films.

​Where are you from?
Dartford, England.

​What do you spend most of your time doing while on Avicus?
Normally AFKing lmao / but also chatting on destroy. At the moment I am really into making maps so I do this most.

Anything else you want to mention?
I want to travel the world when I am older and I am also a big fan of Formula 1.

title: Community Spotlight #14 - Myv
